X.v.1.E.1.e
.
Routing Field Examination Requests
Follow the steps in the table below when routing a field examination request.
Step
Action
1
Add a copy of
VA Form 21-3537a
to the claims folder.
E-mail the original
VA Form 21-3537a
to the fiduciary hub having jurisdiction over the area where the primary beneficiary resides.
2
When a completed field examination report is received, send the report to the activity (authorization or rating) that requested the examination.
Reference
:Â  For more information about jurisdiction and contact information for fiduciary hubs, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 6.C.1.d
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section E  - Requests for Field Examinations
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section E
